definition: Tartar (derogatory)/also used as an insulting term for Manchus around 1900
prisoner of war/to capture/to take prisoner/(old) northern barbarian/slave
expel the Manchu, revolutionary slogan from around 1900

sentences.english: It needed to expel the foreign invaders and take control of its destiny.
sentences.chinese: 中國需要驅除韃虜，掌握自己的命運。
